Package controller

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The dedicated controller class. Contains methods modifying the model through the Grid class and a myriad of useful functions.

                               java.util.List<Colour> lAInput,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> lPInput,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> lPColourInput)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Performs the FF action 4 associated with the isValid.
        Parameters:
        nickName - nickname
        directions - direction list
        weaponToReload - weapon to reload list
        weaponToUse - weapon name
        lI - effect number list
        lS - various strings list
        lAInput - colour list
        lPInput - powerup list
        lPColourInput - powerup colour input
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - RMI exception
